ygData.subject: Re: possible big cheat for EQ....
ygData.msgSnippet: Nothing will come of it... ... From: Kenneth Toomey  To: EQCheats@onelist.com  Date: Tuesday, August 17, 1999
ygData.messageBody:
Nothing will come of it...

-----Original Message-----
From: Kenneth Toomey <kennydt@...>
To: EQCheats@onelist.com <EQCheats@onelist.com>
Date: Tuesday, August 17, 1999 1:53 PM
Subject: Re: [EQCheats] possible big cheat for EQ....


>From: Kenneth Toomey <kennydt@...>
>
>
>
>
>
>
>
>---Jed <jedallen@...> wrote:
>>
>> From: "Jed" <jedallen@...>
>>
>> There is a difference between a small cheat that
>you and your friend know to
>> get a little extra cash, and a third party program
>that anyone can get.
>> Cheating isnt any fun if it wrecks the game, and
>third party programs are
>> one of the main reason UO was destroyed for me.
>>
>> So far there is no way to alt-tab and get any
>functionality out of a third
>> party program. I hope it stays that way.
>>
>> -Laocoon
>>
>> ----- Original Message -----
>> From: Omeg Felligan <omeg_felligan@...>
>> To: <EQCheats@onelist.com>
>> Sent: Tuesday, August 17, 1999 9:38 AM
>> Subject: [EQCheats] possible big cheat for EQ....
>>
>>
>> > From: "Omeg Felligan" <omeg_felligan@...>
>> >
>> > Ok, does anyone remember the days of Diablo where
>you'd just Alt-Tab over
>> to
>> > your cheat program?
>> >
>> > well, I was on ICQ the other day and I got a msg,
>and not thinking I
>> > alt-tab'ed once, nothing, twice and I was out of
>EQ.
>> >
>> > Now, my mouse was fairly locked up, but the key
>board still worked, I
>> could
>> > alt-tab between other programs. (only had ICQ
>open) when the
>> CTRL-ALT-DEL
>> > window came up (I pushed em) I could again use my
>mouse while it was up.
>> >
>> > when I tried to go back into EQ it didn't work,
>but it still takes time to
>> > camp out your character eh? :)
>> >
>> > I'm thinking this may be able to allow some cheat
>programs, but probably
>> > not, everything seems to me server side except
>for hot keys.
>> >
>> > But, I am not a good enough programmer to write
>something that might be
>> able
>> > to take advantage of this, nor do I know anyone
>who is. If you are give
>> > your input and see if anything works eh?
>hehehe...if anyone does figure
>> > something out they'd be a god to EQ cheaters :)
>> >
>> > hope something comes of this,
>> > Omeg
>> >
>> >
>> > --------------------------- ONElist Sponsor
>----------------------------
>> >
>> > Create a list for FRIENDS & FAMILY...
>> > ...and YOU can WIN $100 to Amazon.com. For
>details, go to
>> > http://www.onelist.com/info/onereachsplash3.html
>> >
>> >
>------------------------------------------------------------------------
>> > For more information on how to join the best
>roleplaying game on the net
>> goto www.everquest.com
>>
>>
>> --------------------------- ONElist Sponsor

>>
>> ONElist: home to the world's liveliest email
>communities.
>>
>>
>------------------------------------------------------------------------
>> For more information on how to join the best
>roleplaying game on the net goto www.everquest.com
>>
>Why in the HELL would you want to be able to cheat
>and destroy one of the best games, in my oppinion,
>out yet? I think people like you are morons. I also
>hope that NOTHING at all comes from this.
>-Kenny
>
